statements: SELECT * FROM indie_game_feedback WHERE player_name = 'Alice';
SELECT game_title, rating FROM indie_game_feedback WHERE rating > 4;
SELECT player_name, feedback FROM indie_game_feedback WHERE game_title = 'Super Mario';
SELECT id, player_name, rating FROM indie_game_feedback WHERE rating = 3;
SELECT * FROM indie_game_feedback WHERE id = 10;
SELECT * FROM indie_game_feedback WHERE rating > 3 ORDER BY game_title ASC, rating DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, player_name, feedback FROM indie_game_feedback WHERE game_title LIKE '%adventure%' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT player_name, game_title, rating FROM indie_game_feedback WHERE rating BETWEEN 1 AND 3 ORDER BY player_name ASC;
SELECT player_name, feedback FROM indie_game_feedback WHERE game_title = 'Minecraft' ORDER BY feedback DESC;
SELECT * FROM indie_game_feedback WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5, 7, 9) ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id = 1;
SELECT feedback_text, rating FROM player_feedback WHERE game_id = 5 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT review_text FROM game_reviews WHERE review_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT reviewer_name, review_date FROM game_reviews WHERE game_id = 3 ORDER BY review_date ASC;
SELECT game_id, COUNT(review_id) AS total_reviews FROM game_reviews GROUP BY game_id HAVING total_reviews > 5;
SELECT * FROM player_feedback WHERE player_id = 1001;
SELECT feedback_id, player_id, rating FROM player_feedback WHERE game_id = 2002 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT game_id, COUNT(*) AS total_reviews FROM game_reviews GROUP BY game_id HAVING total_reviews > 5;
SELECT player_id, AVG(rating) AS average_rating FROM player_feedback GROUP BY player_id;
SELECT reviewer_name, review_text FROM game_reviews ORDER BY review_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM indie_games WHERE release_year > 2010;
SELECT player_name, feedback_text FROM player_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 5;
SELECT game_name, genre FROM indie_games WHERE genre = 'Action';
SELECT * FROM game_reviews ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT player_name, review_text FROM game_reviews WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM player_feedback WHERE feedback_id = 1;
SELECT game_id, player_name, feedback_text FROM player_feedback ORDER BY feedback_id DESC;
SELECT review_text, rating FROM game_reviews WHERE rating >= 3 ORDER BY rating DESC;
SELECT * FROM indie_games WHERE genre = 'RPG' AND release_year > 2010;
SELECT game_name, genre, release_year FROM indie_games WHERE genre IN ('Action', 'Adventure') ORDER BY release_year;
SELECT * FROM Game
SELECT game_title, release_date FROM Game WHERE genre='Action'
SELECT player_name, email FROM Player WHERE country='USA' ORDER BY join_date DESC
SELECT game_title, genre, COUNT(game_id) AS total_games FROM Game GROUP BY genre
SELECT review_text, review_date FROM Review WHERE game_id=101 ORDER BY review_date ASC
SELECT * FROM Game WHERE genre='RPG';
SELECT game_title, release_date FROM Game WHERE release_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT player_name, email, country FROM Player WHERE country = 'USA' ORDER BY join_date DESC;
SELECT game_title, genre, COUNT(*) FROM Game GROUP BY genre;
SELECT game_title, player_name, rating, feedback_date FROM Game JOIN Feedback ON Game.game_id = Feedback.game_id JOIN Player ON Feedback.player_id = Player.player_id ORDER BY feedback_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM players WHERE email = 'john.doe@example.com';
SELECT game_title, developer FROM games WHERE release_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT review_text, rating FROM game_reviews WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT player_id, game_id FROM player_feedback ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT developer_name, country FROM developers WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT * FROM player_feedback ORDER BY player_id ASC;
SELECT game_id, review_text, rating FROM game_reviews WHERE rating >= 4;
SELECT player_id, email FROM players WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT game_title, developer, release_date FROM games WHERE developer = 'Rockstar Games';
SELECT developer_id, developer_name, country FROM developers ORDER BY developer_name DESC;
